note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, the death rate metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Death rate from cardiovascular diseases vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The estimated death rate from [cardiovascular diseases](#dod:cvd) per 100,000 people in the population, compared to the country's GDP per capita, adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
